Name: Ideonella sakaiensis bacteria
Description: I.sakaiensis bacteria uses PETase and MHETase to generate energy

Name: Enzyme PETase
Description: Incorporate with PET to make MHET

Name: Enzyme MHETase
Description: Incorporate with MHET to generate glycol and terephthalic acid(easily decomposed by microorganisms or continuing to create MHET)

Name: Enzymeleaf-branch compost cutinase (LCC)
Description: Incorporate with PET to make MHET (more effective than Enzyme PETase - 33 times)
